page.title: 16HOUSING IN THE GULVAL AREA
page.content: There is a variety of housing and living accommodation in the area. The caravan site has some{residential} {caravans.}These are ingeniously designed to give maximum facilities and space, but lack of insulation is a drawback in hot or cold weather. There are{residential chalets}and{flats}at Eastern Green. Though reasonable to rent they are small for families. Traditional granite{cottages}with slate roofs are attractive and have been modernised to include bathrooms. Few have space for a garage, which can cause problems with car parking on narrow village roads. Newer houses tend to be{bungalows}or{detached} {houses}and usually have a garage and garden. They are built of rendered concrete blocks with tile or artifical slate roofs. Many houses have some kind of central heating.
